nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence

Class ActorLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence.ActorLoader

  • public class ActorLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for loading in the secondary actors from a Jar file stored in the levels directory
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>>> unknownClasses
      Stores classes pulled from jar files in the levels directory, by level number.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<?>>> verifiedClasses
      Stores classes that are verified as subtypes of Actor by level number, then by String code.
